de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Interface ImConnectionAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcConnectionAdapter, ImvConnectionAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImConnectionAdapter, ImcConnectionAdapterIetf, ImcConnectionAdapterIetfLong, ImvConnectionAdapterIetf, ImvConnectionAdapterIetfLong

    public interface ImConnectionAdapter
    Generic IM(C/V) connection adapter base containing common connection attributes and functions to control a connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allowMessageReceipt()
      Allows a connection to receive messages.
      void denyMessageReceipt()
      Denies a connection to receive messages.
      long getImId()
      Returns the ID from the IM(C/V) the connection is associated with.
      boolean isReceiving()
      Returns the receiving state of the connection.

    • Method Detail

      • allowMessageReceipt

        void allowMessageReceipt()
        Allows a connection to receive messages.

      • denyMessageReceipt

        void denyMessageReceipt()
        Denies a connection to receive messages.

      • isReceiving

        boolean isReceiving()
        Returns the receiving state of the connection.
        Returns:
        true if message receipt is allowed.

      • getImId

        long getImId()
        Returns the ID from the IM(C/V) the connection is associated with.
        Returns:
        the IM(C/V) ID
